mapper.select: select chn.channel_name,o.cell_sale_volume,o.plan_sale_volume,o.sales,o.views,o.refund_orders,o.settled_payment,o.unsettled_payment,o.timespan from affiliate_hot_outreach o inner join affiliate_outreach_channel chn on chn.id = o.outreach_channel_id where o.brand_id=#{brandId} and o.timespan=#{timespan} order by o.sales desc
